ursabot commented on pull request #11639:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11639#issuecomment-963298350


   Benchmark runs are scheduled for baseline = 2eafc600baa9cc75935a77e490099d9193db5d12 and contender = 76c12424f12eff7d342a1339a25160888d740157. 76c12424f12eff7d342a1339a25160888d740157 is a master commit associated with this PR. Results will be available as each benchmark for each run completes.
   Conbench compare runs links:
   [Scheduled] [ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/477079aa794f40edba9e15b0338d522f...5669facf5bfc49f3ae3a3ae7aaf2fa96/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-i9-9960x](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/fd40b2cede5c4e45b9b7ecdd63ecbdfe...bf92d2c0e93942d2b9a67869a895c73d/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-thinkcentre-m75q](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/0cec6839ea744b7b8e4a1bd62dccb260...757a72d04ea24950a0b6fe1f196fc5d1/)
   Supported benchmarks:
   ursa-i9-9960x: langs = Python, R, JavaScript
   ursa-thinkcentre-m75q: langs = C++, Java
   ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2: cloud = True
